pkgmetadata.longdescription: Process Data from Wearable Research Devices Using Two-Regression Algorithms // Application of two-regression algorithms for wearable research devices. It provides an easy way for users to read in device data files and apply an appropriate two- regression algorithm. More information is available from Hibbing PR, LaMunion SR, Kaplan AS, Crouter SE (2017) doi:10.1249/MSS.0000000000001532.
